participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about his art, enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: My parents are very supportive of my art, even though they don't understand it. I tend to drop things when my stomach is empty. I am a cyclist. I had a gig at local theater last night. I love hot wings.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, enjoys connecting with people and learning new things.
participant_2.background: I am a fourth child who was once lucky enough to swim with manta rays. I'm not sure if my family would be accepting of me, but I hope they would be. I used to be able to run really fast. My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax. I enjoy playing guitar and video games.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing alright, a bit tired from work but overall good.
What kind of work do you do?
I'm a nurse. How about you?
I'm an artist. I had a gig at a local theater last night.
That's so cool! What kind of art do you make?
I'm a painter, I mostly do landscapes and portraits.
That's really awesome, I've always wanted to be able to paint.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun and very relaxing.
Maybe I will, I've always been pretty good at drawing.
That's great, you should definitely give it a go!
Thanks for the encouragement, I might just do that.
You're welcome!
So what are some of your favorite paintings?
I really like the works of Van Gogh and Monet.
Me too! I love their use of color and light.
They're both amazing artists.
Yeah they really are.
So, what did you do for work today?
I was at the hospital all day, it was pretty busy.
Oh, I bet. I'm glad you made it through the day!
Thanks, me too.
So, what's your favorite TV show?
I like medical dramas and comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.
That makes sense, I can see why you like those types of shows.
Yeah, they're my go-to shows when I want to relax.
I think I'm going to go get some dinner, I'm starving.
Oh, me too. I'm going to go make myself some food.
Okay, I'm going to go. It was nice talking to you!
You too
